testcase.classname: Verify E-Commerce Product APIs http Request
testcase.name: Verify Login Functionality is being called successfully using LoginAPI
testcase.system-out: Given Login Functionality Payload with "userEmail" and "userPassword".......passed When user call "LoginAPI" using "Post" http request.........................passed Then LoginAPI called got successfully with status code 200..................passed And Verify "message" in response body is "Login Successfully"...............passed

testcase.classname: Verify E-Commerce Product APIs http Request
testcase.name: Verify Functionality of addProduct is being added successfully using CreateProductAPI
testcase.system-out: Given addProduct Payload with "One Plus 10T","Electronics","Mobiles","49999","8plus gen1","Men-Women" and ".\Product_Image\OnePlus.png".passed When user call "CreateProductAPI" using "Post" http request.................passed Then CreateProductAPI called got successfully with status code 201..........passed And Verify "message" in response body is "Product Added Successfully".......passed And Stored "productId" by using "One Plus 10T"..............................passed

testcase.classname: Verify E-Commerce Product APIs http Request
testcase.name: Verify Functionality of addProduct is being added successfully using CreateProductAPI 2
testcase.system-out: Given addProduct Payload with "Redmi k50","Electronics","Mobiles","44999","180mega camera","Men-Women" and ".\Product_Image\Redmi.png".passed When user call "CreateProductAPI" using "Post" http request.................passed Then CreateProductAPI called got successfully with status code 201..........passed And Verify "message" in response body is "Product Added Successfully".......passed And Stored "productId" by using "Redmi k50".................................passed

testcase.classname: Verify E-Commerce Product APIs http Request

testcase.classname: Verify E-Commerce Product APIs http Request
